org.jgentleframework.core.interceptor
Interface RuntimeLoading

public interface RuntimeLoading

Represents runtime loading status of an Interceptor

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Summary
 boolean isRuntimeLoading()
          Returns true if the current Interceptor instance implements this interface always reloads the corresponding Definition before invoking and false otherwise.

          Sets the runtime loading.
